channel.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
channel.description:
Hello! I saw that you didn't like my last model =/ So I made this one... ¡Lord Knight Axe! I discovered this Battleaxe on Regnum Online. It was a great weapon and also a very much valuable thing... So I made this for runescape, but very simplified. [b][u]Regnum Images[/u][/b] [url=http://img80.imageshack.us/f/screenshot2010060321223.jpg/]http://img80.imageshack.us/f/screenshot2010060321223.jpg/[/url] [url=http://img80.imageshack.us/f/screenshot2010060321223.jpg/]http://img80.imageshack.us/f/screenshot2010060321223.jpg/[/url]
[u][b]My Model Images...[/b][/u] On the floor... [img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/9213/lord1.png[/img] [url=http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/9213/lord1.png]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/9213/lord1.png[/url] [img]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/6992/sinttuloaw.png[/img] [url=http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/6992/sinttuloaw.png]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/6992/sinttuloaw.png[/url] Wearing... [img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/2480/lord2p.png[/img] [url=http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/2480/lord2p.png]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/2480/lord2p.png[/url] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2892/lord3.png[/img] [url=http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2892/lord3.png]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2892/lord3.png[/url] [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/1230/lord4.png[/img] [url=http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/1230/lord4.png]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/1230/lord4.png[/url] Now I don't will release, cause i have to work more on this, just i wanna know if its a good idea... If you have anything to suggest me... -------------------------------------------------------------- Credits: Joeli 19% Edit, search, upload images, post Metaseq 20% Im using it.. NGDStudios 50% Make the baxe SilentCJ 5% For his tut My chair 1% hold my 70 kilograms

item.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I made a topic with a video in it showing me making a primitive model. If you can keep up with the mouse and what I click on(vid is 2x speed), then you might be able to figure out how to use primitives

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Ok thanks for help me, ill restart again =)
Rlly, thx for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Faces kinda messy and it would take someone on mass amounts of steroids to lift that thing. Make it a bit smaller and try to be realistic with size unlike those Japanese games that make swords 100 ft long. Been watching too much anime in my opinion. Like man killerx said use prims, or if you trace, make a good wire frame structure.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Too flat, but pretty good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Lord Knight Axe *3rd model*
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

Okay seems how no one else is going to speak their mind,
The model looks like shit.

But, Here is some cc to help you.
If you are going to trace, Then make half the axe and mirror it.
Try primitives they will give you a better idea of where faces should go.
Also, The axe is way too big, That would probably glitch the hell out of someones Character.

Keep trying.

Read full topic

Hello!
I saw that you didn’t like my last model =/
So I made this one…
¡Lord Knight Axe!
I discovered this Battleaxe on Regnum Online. It was a great weapon and
also a very much valuable thing…
So I made this for runescape, but very simplified.
